sn24.19:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.19:1.3: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va, esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.19:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.19:2.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.19:3.4: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya—
sn24.19:3.7: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkham upadaya, dukkham abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.19:3.14: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya
sn24.19:3.17: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkham upadaya, dukkham abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.19:3.18: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va, esikatthayitthita’”ti.
